tokenTerrain.name: Token Difficult Terrain
tokenTerrain.hint: Implements Dnd5e rules for moving through tokens (requires Include Live/Dead Tokens from Enhanced Terrain Layer).

elevationSwitching.name: Use Elevation
elevationSwitching.hint: Tokens with their movement speed set to automatic will take into account their elevation. When disabled it will use their highest movement speed instead.

flyingElevation.name: Elevate Flying
flyingElevation.hint: Flying tokens will ignore terrain they are at the upper edge of.

forceFlying.name: Force Flying
forceFlying.hint: Tokens at elevation 0 will default to their flying speed if it is bigger than their walking speed.

forceSwimming.name: Force Swimming
forceSwimming.hint: Tokens at elevation 0 and in water terrain will default to their swimming speed if it is bigger than their walking speed.

forceBurrowing.name: Force Burrowing
forceBurrowing.hint: Tokens at elevation 0 but not in water terrain will default to their burrowing speed if it is bigger than their walking and flying speed.

hideSpeedButton.name: Hide "Switch Speed" Button
hideSpeedButton.hint: Hides the "Switch Speed" button from the Token HUD for the current user.

restrictSpeedButton.name: Restrict "Switch Speed" Button
restrictSpeedButton.hint: Restricts the "Switch Speed" button to a minimal permission level.

hideTerrainButton.name: Hide "Toggle Terrain" Button
hideTerrainButton.hint: Hides the "Toggle Terrain" button from the Token HUD for the current user.

restrictTerrainButton.name: Restrict "Toggle Terrain" Button
restrictTerrainButton.hint: Restricts the "Toggle Terrain" button to a minimal permission level.

oneDnd.name: Enable OneDnD Playtest Rules
oneDnd.hint: Implements alternative movement rules from the latest OneDnD playtest.

cycleMovement.name: Cycle Movement Modes
cycleMovement.hint: Cycles through the selected tokens' movement modes.

cycleMovementReverse.name: Cycle Movement Modes (Reverse)
cycleMovementReverse.hint: Cycles backward through the selected tokens' movement modes.

toggleTerrain.name: Toggle Terrain
toggleTerrain.hint: Toggles all additional movement costs for the selected tokens.

forceTeleport.name: Force Teleport Movement
forceTeleport.hint: When held makes tokens teleport regardless of their selected movement mode.
